name: AltTextGeneratorAI.com – Automatically generate alt text for images to rank and improve SEO
author: Bryam Loaiza

sections.description:
AltTextGeneratorAI.com automatically generates descriptive alt text for your images using AI to help you rank faster on Google and other search engines.

Rank faster on search engines with SEO optimized alt text descriptions and increase visibility using AltTextGeneratorAI.

Automatic: Alt text is automatically added to every image uploaded on the site.

Customizable: Manually update and edit the AI generated alt text. You can also click on the Generate Alt Text button to generate alt text for each image.

Easy to set up: Just choose a plan and start generating.

Free credits: Get 2 free credits upon sign up.
sections.installation:
1. Visit Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for “Alt Text Generator AI”
  3. Install and Activate Alt Text Generator AI from your Plugins page
  4. Visit https://alttextgeneratorai.com to sign up for a free account.
  5. Link your account by going to Dashboard and copying your API key into the Alt Text Generator AI plugin settings page.
  6. Done! You can now generate alt text for images automatically and manually using AI.
sections.faq: See our FAQ for answers to our most common questions.
sections.changelog:
1.0.5

Fixed bugs

1.0.4

Moved button to be positioned below alt text content area.

1.0.3

Fixed styling for generate alt text button.

1.0.2

New button added to generate alt text from media section.

1.0.1

Tested up to WordPress 6.6.

1.0.0

Initial version.

short_description: Automatically generate descriptive alt text for your images upon upload. Craft great alt text descriptions to boost SEO and improve visibility.

screenshots.caption: When you upload an image, alt text is automatically generated for that image.
Add your API key on the plugin settings page. You will see your current plan and credits.
Visit alttextgeneratorai.com to find API key and download plugin zip file if needed.
Generate alt text for your images from the media section.
